product_name: Under Armour UA CORE 2.0 Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Decked out with adjustable grips, extended peripheral clarity and a signature cap gripper design, these shades deliver peak performance during high-intensity sports in the sun, shade or water.
short_description: Decked out with adjustable grips, extended peripheral clarity and a signature cap gripper design, these shades deliver peak performance during high-intensity sports in the sun, shade or water.
